name: Angry Lion Attack Simba
description:
Angry Lion Attack.

- When we were crazy for playing video games! Now those days are back with this Circus lion jump game. Circus Lion Jump game is a classic Arcade lover.

- In the Circus Lion Jump game, clown ride a lion in circus and to jump to avoid obstacles. Your task as gamer in the Circus Lion Jump game is Survive lion and clown from upcoming fire ring and other fire obstacles.

- Circus Lion Jumper game has an eye-catching circus environment and beautiful sound. Circus Lion Jump game is endless runner and jumper game.

- You can control lion run and jump through joysticks. Save lion from incoming ring of flames. Keep playing the game as long as you can save the lion from clashing against Fire Ring flames and fire port.

Feature:

- High Quality graphics.
- Smooth Joysticks Control.
- Endless Fun with Clown rides a lion.
- Easy to play.

Enjoy.
